block.p: LEAD: The assets of the nation's 495 money market mutual funds increased $2.73 billion, to $387.39 billion, for the week that ended Wednesday, the Investment Company Institute said yesterday. The assets of the 150 institutional funds increased by $401.9 million, to $92.11 billion. The assets of the 244 general-purpose funds were up by $1.02 billion, to $130.87 billion.

LEAD: The assets of the nation's 495 money market mutual funds increased $2.73 billion, to $387.39 billion, for the week that ended Wednesday, the Investment Company Institute said yesterday. The assets of the 150 institutional funds increased by $401.9 million, to $92.11 billion. The assets of the 244 general-purpose funds were up by $1.02 billion, to $130.87 billion.

The assets of the nation's 495 money market mutual funds increased $2.73 billion, to $387.39 billion, for the week that ended Wednesday, the Investment Company Institute said yesterday. The assets of the 150 institutional funds increased by $401.9 million, to $92.11 billion. The assets of the 244 general-purpose funds were up by $1.02 billion, to $130.87 billion. The 101 broker-dealer funds rose $1.31 billion, to $164.42 billion, the institute said.
